entities.name: kraacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who is loyal to the Black family. He is described as being watery-eyed and having a loud voice.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather and a wizard. He is described as seizing Kreacher by the back of his loincloth and throwing him out of the room.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts. She is described as protesting when Sirius seizes Kreacher.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story and a wizard. He is described as trying to eavesdrop on visitors with his friends.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is Harry's mother figure and a witch. She is described as recalling Harry and his friends to their tasks when they try to eavesdrop.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the potions master at Hogwarts and a wizard. He is described as flitting in and out of the house several times.

relationships.description: Sirius seizes Kreacher by the back of his loincloth and throws him bodily from the room.
Harry tries to eavesdrop on visitors with Mrs. Weasley's help.
